title: golem-powers:writing-skills - Meta-skill for creating executable skills
description: Create a meta-skill that teaches Claude how to create OTHER golem-powers skills correctly. Supports DUAL execution: bash scripts for simple wrappers, TypeScript/Bun for complex logic. Skills have execute: frontmatter that Claude auto-runs on invocation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md with frontmatter: name, description (NO execute - this is a meta-skill)
Document the golem-powers skill structure in SKILL.md:
- SKILL.md MUST have YAML frontmatter with: name, description, execute (path to script)
- CLAUDE.md (optional) for environment requirements and complex setup
- scripts/ directory with executable files (bash or wrapper for TypeScript)
- Scripts output Markdown for Claude to parse
- For complex logic, API calls, type safety
Document --action=xxx pattern for multiple operations in one skill
Document: 'When loading a golem-powers skill with execute: frontmatter, Claude MUST run that script IMMEDIATELY via Bash before any other action'
Create workflows/create.md - step-by-step for creating new skill
Create workflows/audit.md - checklist for verifying skill structure
Create example skill: golem-powers/example-bash/ with working bash script
Create example skill: golem-powers/example-typescript/ with working Bun script
Run shellcheck on all .sh files - must pass with no errors
